post.body: You should definitely be receiving a check from @TweetDeck in the mail sometime soon. LOL.
Twitterrific FTW!!!
Just switched back to TweetDeck because of the praises it received from @Knunez.
High on Cinnamon Toast Crunch!!! I'm bouncing off the walls!!!
Finally out of bed. What's going on in the Twitterverse?
I'm finally in my bed. Success!!!
I haven't been asleep since 9:30 last night. I'm so close to crashing right now.
Eating Red Velvet cake for breakfast. Yum!!!
Just finished downloading iConquer, Enigmo 2, and Headline from the Mac Giving Tree http://tinyurl.com/2vaxuk
Ping.fm works for MySpace again...FINALLY!!!
Wow...my Twitter Grade is 63/100. I guess I need to study a little harder. BTW, this is update #300.
Searching the web for blogging tips and custom twitter backgrounds.
Finally back at home and in desperate need of a nap.
Just finished an iChat session with my frat brother. He wanted to show his family the power of the Mac.
Merry Christmas Everyone!!!
My best friend is visiting. I haven't seen her in years. I'm so excited.
I should have posted a link to this on my birthday, but it's better late than never. Right? http://tinyurl.com/8qk6r9
Awake.
Finally going to bed. I should have been asleep hours ago.
I sometimes wonder why I subscribe to certain YouTube Channels.
